entry.title: SPECIAL AIR QUALITY STATEMENT ENDED, Golden
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 7:14 a.m. PDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries changing to 30 percent chance of rain showers this morning. Snow level near valley bottom. High 7. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early this evening. Snow level near valley bottom. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 4 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Saturday 1 April 2023
